ing: 3 packets granular no-calorie sucralose sweetener (such as SplendaÂ®)
des: "A delicious low-carb and sugar-free alternative to the traditional calorie- and sugar-laden coffee drinks. A basic recipe that is easily modified to suit personal tastes."
ins: Pour almond milk, coffee, sugar, and cream cheese into large plastic cup; blend with an immersion blender until the cream cheese is completely blended into the liquid, about 1 minute. Pour the blended beverage into a tall glass with ice cubes.
